notes.reading-notes:
SAMPLE READING NOTES
TOPIC: a theory about the mysterious disappearance of colonists from Roanoke Island
main points about the theory:
117 English colonists disappeared from Roanoke Island in late 1500s
colonists carved "Cro" on tree and "Croatan" on fence post
theory is that colonists went to nearby island of Croatan
notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE LISTENING NOTES
TOPIC: doubt cast on the theory in the reading passage
information that casts doubt on the theory:
no remnants of colonists on Croatan Island in spite of numerous searches
Croatan is a name given to more than just an island
a tribe sometimes called Croatans had members who read and wrote in English and had English features (light hair and eyes)
